```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy import linalg
>>> a = np.array([[-3, -2, 0], [-1, -1, 3], [3, -5, -1]])
>>> b = np.array([[1]])
>>> q = np.array([[1],[2],[3]])
>>> x = linalg.solve_sylvester(a, b, q)
>>> x
array([[ 0.0625],
 [-0.5625],
 [ 0.6875]])
>>> np.allclose(a.dot(x) + x.dot(b), q)
True 
```
